title: Charles Nirmalanathan
text:
Iruthayanathan Charles Nirmalanathan (; born 24 November 1975) is a <a href="Sri%20Lankan%20Tamils">Sri Lankan Tamil</a> politician and <a href="Member%20of%20Parliament%20%28Sri%20Lanka%29">Member of Parliament</a>.
Early life.
Nirmalanathan was born on 24 November 1975. He was educated at <a href="Velautham%20Maha%20Vidyalayam">Velautham Maha Vidyalayam</a> in <a href="Point%20Pedro">Point Pedro</a>.
Career.
Nirmalanathan is president of the Vavuniya Citizens Committee. He is a member of the <a href="Illankai%20Tamil%20Arasu%20Kachchi">Illankai Tamil Arasu Kachchi</a>.
Nirmalanathan contested the <a href="2013%20Sri%20Lankan%20provincial%20council%20elections">2013 provincial council election</a> one of the <a href="Tamil%20National%20Alliance">Tamil National Alliance</a> (TNA) <a href="electoral%20alliance">electoral alliance</a>'s candidates in <a href="Mannar%20District">Mannar District</a> but failed to get elected after coming 4th amongst the TNA candidates. He contested the <a href="2015%20Sri%20Lankan%20parliamentary%20election">2015 parliamentary election</a> as one of the TNA's candidates in <a href="Vanni%20Electoral%20District">Vanni District</a> and was elected to the <a href="Parliament%20of%20Sri%20Lanka">Parliament of Sri Lanka</a>. He was re-elected at the <a href="2020%20Sri%20Lankan%20parliamentary%20election">2020 parliamentary election</a>.
